name.description: Name of the public or private channel to create.

description.description: Description of the public or private channel to create.

is_private.description: When `true`, creates a private channel instead of a public channel

org_wide.description: When `true`, the channel will be available org-wide. Note: if the channel is not `org_wide=true`, you must specify a `team_id` for this channel

team_id.description: The workspace to create the channel in. Note: this argument is required unless you set `org_wide=true`.
